entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending overnight then clearing. Risk of thundershowers and hail this evening. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
